page.title: 18TELEVISION S.HEDINGHAM
page.content: Lots of people like watching {television.}There is a wide variety of programmes shown on{four channels.} Many of them are American but a small percentage are ethnic. There are{childrens programmes}like cartoons,films and factual. There are information programmes like the news and sport. The{adult programmes } include films,factual,drama,soap operas and music. We watch{television}after school and in the evening but mostly on Saturday night. On Monday- Fame and Blue Peter: Tuesday- Magnum and Behind the Lines: Wednesday- Dallas:Thursday-Street Street Hawk:Arther C.Clarkes World of Strange Powers:Friday- Airwolf,Dempsey and Makepeace,Saturday-Dynasty,A-Team: World of Sport and on Sunday- Juliet Bravo and Wonder Woman.
